text: Ohlone people are a Native American people from the north and central California coast. They lived in small villages, and they hunted deer and other animals. Ohlone groups who lived near the shore ate shellfish too. After eating them, they put their shells in mounds called shellmounds. They also buried the dead in shellmounds. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.muwekma.org - Muwekma Ohlone Tribe of the San Francisco Bay Area *http://www.ohlonenation.org - The Ohlone Nation Category:Native Americans Category:Ethnic groups in the United States
title: Ohlone
